=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 8 hours -
16 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 5 hours 20 mins -
10 hours 40 mins || 64 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 3 hours 33 mins 20 secs -
7 hours 6 mins 40 secs || 43 mulch |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
